Feel free to explore and test

Vocabulary

Learn and practise vocabulary

This page helps to learn and practice new words. There are two modes. You can type words or move them to match with word of the second language. The technologies used: GO, JavaScript. To see the structure of the game visit README.md in GitHub

Songs Book

Lyrics and chords in playlists

Page to replace printed lyrics with chords. It displays songs with lyrics and chords sorted in playlists. The user can choose an active playlist and for better transparency turn chords on/off or fold repetitive paragraphs. The whole backend runs on GO without third party code. Even the relation database engine is designen from ground up.

Climbing Blog

Explore climbing world with me

The page is prepared for future content. Sadly I don't have time to sit and write articles of my climbing adventures. The page should also offer climbing destination people can visit with me.

Placal Cup

Page made for volleyball tournament

A page requested by the volleyball tournament organizer. The goal was to create a minimalistic page which automatically fetches tables from Excel (The organizers are used to it and want to stick with it), and displays it to players. The page is written in PHP.

Code Examples

Mostly visualization of algorithms

This page displays mostly visualization of algorithms. Most of the code was written in Python to help students of University to understand basic algorithms (Neural Nets, EM algorithm, ...). The page should in the future displays visualization and describes key parts of code.
